item.title: Anti Random
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

Work still in progress but im putting it out anyway

Ok here it is it is made to open youtube and go to a
video this should give your script 30% less detectable.
Here it is just add it to your script
Thanks to [glow=red,2,300]junior[/glow] for fixing a small problem

[code]program New;
{.include srl/srl.scar}

procedure antirandomsupport;
begin
//mmouse(379, 109, 3,3);
//begin
mouse(379, 109, 3, 3, true);
//end;
end;

procedure findsite;
begin
mmouse(650, 47, 3, 3);
//begin
wait(1000 + random (500));
SendKeys(‘www.youtube.com’);//dont change
//end;
end;

procedure finish;
begin
mmouse(742,48,3,3);
wait(800);
//begin
mouse(742,48,3,3,true);
wait(3000 + random(500));
//end;
end;

procedure help;
begin
mmouse(120, 503, 3, 3);
wait(800 + random(100));
//begin
//mouse(120,503,48,3,3,true)
mouse(120, 503, 3, 3, true);
wait(1000 + random (500));
//end;
end;

begin
cleardebug;
setupsrl;
activateClient;
repeat
antirandomsupport;
wait(500 + random (100));
findsite;
wait(500 + random (100));
finish;
wait(500 + random (100));
help;
until(true)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
